get_ambiguity_adar(f1, is_raw1, f2, is_raw2)[source]¶
Parameters

  • f1 – the function that takes in the attribute dict of one node and output its first_attr_val

  • f2 – the function that takes in the attribute dict of one node and output its second_attr_val

  • is_raw1 – boolean, whether the first attribute value is raw

  • is_raw2 – boolean, whether the second attribute value is raw

Returns

dictionary of node’s ambiguous val
